programme.sub-title: O Ninja Nmero Um Hiper Ativo E Cabea Oca Entram Na Briga

programme.title: Pnico em Seattle, (2012, Action)

programme.title: Ataque do Tubaro Mutante, (2011, Horror)

programme.desc: Um grupo de funcionrios da revista Geographic chega a uma ilha deserta no Sudeste Asitico para preparar um novo espetculo. O lder da expedio esconde dos colegas que veio aqui para encontrar o pai, desaparecido h muitos anos.

programme.title: Zumbis E Robs, (2013, Action)

programme.title: Macaco Vs. Mquina, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Reconhecendo o poder destrutivo de seu macaco gigante, os militares criam sua prpria Inteligncia Artificial pronta para a batalha, o Macaco Mecha, mas seu primeiro teste prtico d terrivelmente errado.

programme.title: Abismo Estelar, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nave espacial viajando atravs de Portais Estelares fica presa no Abismo Estelar. Com apenas 4 dos 15 passageiros capazes de usar as cpsulas de hibernao, um deles libera um monstro aliengena para aumentar suas chances.

programme.title: Impacto, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um professor de astronomia da NASA faz a terrvel descoberta de que um asteroide destruidor est em rota de coliso com a Terra e precisar proteger sua famlia enquanto alerta o mundo sobre a iminente devastao.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1991, Drama)

programme.title: Drages para Sempre, (1988, Action)

programme.desc: O inspetor Paul Fein volta sua antiga vizinhana para desvendar um crime: a mfia russa suspeita de ter assassinado um padre. Desta vez, ele precisa enfrentar fantasmas do passado, sob o risco de ter a sua famlia na mira dos bandidos.

programme.title: Amor e Balas, (1979, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson um policial escolhido pelo governo dos Estados Unidos para cuidar de uma misso mortal na qual deve viajar meio mundo para capturar uma bela amante de um Czar submundo do crime.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)

programme.desc: Ana continua em dvida: casa-se com Cristbal ou corre atrs de Guillermo para declarar seu amor; Guillermo diz a Pedro que no acha que foi Ana a culpada.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Ana acaba dizendo sim e se casa com Cristbal, mesmo com Guillermo torcendo para que ela recusasse; durante a festa, Guillermo faz o brinde.

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aps a festa, Cristbal e Ana vo para o quarto de npcias, mas encontram as crianas dormindo na cama de casal.

programme.title: Jacob's Cross, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Lerato est grvida; Prospero no gosta da proposta de Abayomi, o que cria rivalidade entre ele e Jacob; Thembi perdoa Jacob pela sua colaborao com Abayomi; Jacob e Lerato se casam.

programme.title: Outra Vida, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma cientista desenvolve uma droga revolucionria que induz realidades virtuais e expande a sensao de tempo. O governo tenta assumir projeto, e agora ela precisa decidir como usar sua poderosa criao.

programme.title: E.A.S. - Esquadro Antissequestro, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas sequestra a filha de um jogador de futebol e planeja explodir o Maracan em plena Copa do Mundo. Rafael, ex-integrante do Esquadro Antissequestro, tem a misso de salvar a menina e impedir o desastre.

programme.title: Laos de um Crime, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma famlia de policiais sofre um verdadeiro colapso moral. Isso porque dois irmos, sufocados pela sombra do pai, o ex-chefe de polcia, precisam investigar um crime que eles prprios cometeram.

programme.title: Bodyguard - Resgate de Risco, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Depois de perder o mestre em artes-marciais, Wu-Lin deixa seu lar e se torna guarda-costas de Fei-Fei, a filha do chefe da famlia mais rica da cidade. Em circunstncias perigosas, ele descobre muitos segredos e ameaas.

programme.title: Departamento Q: O Ausente, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Vinte anos depois do assassinato de jovens gmeos, o caso acaba na mesa de Carls Morck e ele logo percebe que algo est terrivelmente errado. Na poca, o caso havia sido encerrado com a condenao de um forasteiro.

programme.title: A Famlia, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Fred Blake, um ex-mafioso, precisa se mudar para a Frana, junto de sua famlia, aps entrar para o programa de proteo testemunhas. De incio, eles se adaptam nova vida, mas aos poucos os velhos hbitos voltam tona.

programme.title: O Super Lobista, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: O poderoso lobista Jack Abramoff est decidido a adquirir todas as coisas boas que dinheiro, poder e privilgio podem comprar. Com seu parceiro de negcios Michael Scanlon a seu lado, Abramoff usa sua influncia para acumular um imprio lucrativo.

programme.title: A Recompensa, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aps passar 12 anos na priso, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime.

programme.title: As tenses aumentam medida que o torneio americano esquenta. Max luta pela chance de beyblade contra o time de sua me, o All-Starz, em uma partida.

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: A partida decisiva das finais dos torneios americanos se resume a Max vs. Michael, do 'All Starz', em uma batalha que coloca cincia e tecnologia contra o esprito humano.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: Depois de derrotar por pouco o All Starz no Torneio Americano, Kenny decide que ele deve registrar um banco de dados dos pontos altos e baixos dos BladeBreakers desde o incio.
programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.desc: Beyblade

programme.title: O Dono da Festa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Van Wilder ficou famoso na cidade por organizar as melhores festas da faculdade. Porm, o veterano forado a mudar sua rotina de sete anos aps perder a mesada do pai, deixando as festividades com os dias contados.

programme.title: Um Lobo em Pele de Cordeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em uma terra mgica, em um prado calmo onde ovelhas podem viver sem preocupaes, problemas comeam a aparecer quando um grupo de lobos est instalado nas proximidades.

programme.title: Alex Rider Contra o Tempo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex Rider, adolescente britnico habilidoso em lingustica, mergulho, artes marciais e tiro, recrutado pelo MI6. Sua primeira misso investigar o bilionrio Darrius Sayle, que fez suspeitas doaes de mega computadores s escolas da Inglaterra.

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, a dona de casa Bridget forada a assumir um trabalho como auxiliar de limpeza na Casa da Moeda em Kansas City, Missouri, e acaba planejando o roubo de uma fortuna em notas gastas destinadas destruio.

programme.title: Minha Vida de Cachorro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Nos anos 1950, Ingemar enviado para parentes no interior da Sucia devido doena de sua me. Inicialmente com dificuldades de adaptao e saudades da famlia, ele acaba vivendo experincias marcantes para toda sua vida.

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Big Stone Gap o lar de personagens charmosos e excntricos. Ave Maria Mulligan, uma farmacutica de 35 anos, a solteirona da cidade. A vida de Ave vira de cabea para baixo depois que ela descobre um segredo de famlia.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Chester e Colette decidem fazer uma viagem de barco Grcia. No local, eles conhecem Rydal, um guia americano que fala grego e decide ajud-los. O que eles no sabem que Rydal conhecido por aplicar golpes nos turistas.

programme.title: Tuff Turf - O Rebelde, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Prestes a terminar o ensino mdio, Morgan obrigado a mudar seu estilo de vida ao trocar de escola. L, ele acaba se envolvendo com a namorada do lder de uma gangue.

programme.title: Terra dos Bravos, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O detetive Matthias Breecher contratado para rastrear o pior dos criminosos da guerra dos confederados. Enquanto percorre o Velho Oeste em busca de justia, sua determinao testada quando ele conhece uma pioneira que muito mais do que parece.

programme.title: Instinto Materno, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps trauma, uma me solteira se muda com a filha para uma isolada fazenda no interior. Mas logo coisas sinistras voltam a acontecer e seus instintos maternos so colocados prova novamente.

programme.title: Yugi derrota o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis, mas h mais dois esperando nas asas! Ser que o Kaiba verdadeiro alcanar Yugi a tempo de ajud-lo a derrotar esse impostor?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey decide batalhar contra Rex Raptor sem a ajuda de seus amigos para provar que homem bastante para cuidar de Serenity sozinho.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey duela com bravura, mas Rex Raptor liberou sua arma secreta: o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Joey precisa descobrir o segredo do presente de Yugi, a carta Mago do Tempo, sem a ajuda de Yugi, ou partir do Reino dos Duelistas no prximo navio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura, um colega de turma de Yugi, possudo pelos poderes escuros de seu Anel do Milnio, prende Yugi e seus amigos em um Jogo das Sombras no qual eles se tornam as prprias cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: PaniK, o duelista de Pegasus, trapaceia e ganha todas as estrelas de Mai. Yugi jura derrot-lo e recuper-las. Porm, o Castelo de Iluses Escuras de PaniK envolve seus monstros numa nvoa escura. Como Yugi derrotar um inimigo que ele no pode ver?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: A Luz no Fim do Tnel

programme.title: Apesar de sua surpreendente desvantagem, Yugi provoca PaniK destemidamente: Vou acabar com voc em trs turnos. Yugi est blefando ou tem a vantagem nesta batalha de inteligncia?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba desce at o reino para enfrentar Pegasus! Ser que Kaiba mudou aps sua batalha com Yugi ou ainda o mesmo duelista impiedoso? A resposta jaz numa batalha entre o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis de Kaiba e o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A gangue do duelista americano n 1, Bandit Keith, sequestra Joey para uma caverna secreta com um cemitrio como campo de jogo. Enquanto Yugi e seus amigos procuram por ele, Joey enfrenta monstros zumbis que ficam mais forte ao sarem de seus tmulos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A ltima tentativa de Joey, sua carta da sorte Mago do Tempo, fracassa contra os monstros zumbis de Bandit Keith. Ao passo que sua mar de sorte acaba, ser que suas habilidades melhoradas e amor por sua irm o inspiraro para a vitria?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Presos na caverna labirinto, Yugi e seus amigos encontram uma sada alternativa, mas a porta vigiada pelos Irmos Paradoxo, irmos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey combinam foras e se defendem dos monstros de seus oponentes, mas as coisas logo mudaro, j que os Irmos Paradoxo invocam o todo-poderoso Guardio do Porto, um monstro que reflete qualquer ataque!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Usando a mgica do Olho do Milnio, Pegasus prende a alma de Mokuba dentro de uma carta bem na frente de Kaiba! Para conseguir o direito de desafiar Pegasus, Kaiba precisa derrotar Yugi e pegar suas estrelas primeiro.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba invoca Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, o monstro mais forte do jogo, a fuso de trs Drages Brancos de Olhos Azuis! Yugi perdeu seus poderosos Monstros de Duelo, mas um duelista verdadeiro nunca desiste!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi comea a tecer uma estratgia para destruir o Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, mas tem que decidir se vai clamar vitria ou poupar a vida de Kaiba. O corao de Yugi est dividido.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Tendo perdido suas estrelas para Kaiba, assim como sua nica chance de salvar seu av, Yugi est em estado de choque. Ser que Ta pode fazer Yugi recobrar os sentidos ganhando as estrelas de Mai, ensinando o corao do duelista a Yugi?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos entram no castelo e veem que Kaiba est pronto para duelar contra Pegasus, e a alma de Mokuba continua com um futuro incerto! O poder do Olho do Milnio d a Pegasus a habilidade de ler a mente das pessoas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba impotente diante do deck Mundo Toon de Pegasus e de sua habilidade de ler mentes. Quando o duelo acaba, Pegasus prende a alma de Kaiba em uma carta, como com o av de Yugi e Mokuba! Yugi est farto!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: a noite da vspera da batalha final, e muitas criaturas esto agitadas! Yugi jura derrotar Pegasus pelo bem de seu av. Tristan lidera uma equipe de reconhecimento para descobrir os segredos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Diante do olhar sufocante de Pegasus, Yugi se distrai do duelo com Mai. Aps cometer erros de ttica bobos e deixar Mai obter uma vantagem enorme com seu Drago de Estimao da Harpia, ser que Yugi recuperar o foco ou sucumbir presso intensa?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Mai se recuperou de sua derrota anterior para Joey, tornando-se uma duelista melhor. Ser que Yugi aprendeu com sua derrota para Kaiba, ou o sentimento de derrota ainda pesa em seu corao? A resposta est nas cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey procura desesperadamente a carta que permitir que ele entre na batalha final, sem perceber que Bandit Keith a roubou. Enquanto ele reluta em aceitar que Serenity ficar cega para sempre, ele recebe ajuda de um novo amigo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Aps o deck Mquina de Bandit Keith forar Joey a jogar na defensiva, Joey copia a estratgia de Keith e metaliza seu Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Sua vitria certa, ou o trapaceiro Bandit Keith tem literalmente uma ltima carta debaixo da manga?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Com seu orgulho por sua fora como duelista em jogo, Joey desafia Yugi pelo direito de enfrentar Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi fica chocado quando Joey usa a carta Mago do Tempo contra ele, justamente a carta que ele deu a Joey como sinal de amizade!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi se prepara para a batalha suprema contra Pegasus, com as almas de seu av, Kaiba e Mokuba em jogo. No meio-tempo, Tristan e Bakura se infiltram no castelo para encontrar os irmos Kaiba, mas ser que Bakura est voltando ao seu eu maligno de novo?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 1

programme.title: Pegasus tambm pune Yugi com seu deck Toon e habilidade de ler mentes. Ao passo que Pegasus faz os monstros de Yugi se virarem contra ele, Yugi perde a determinao de batalhar. Ser que Pegasus prender a alma de Yugi em uma carta, assim como com Kaiba?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 2

programme.title: Yugi descobriu como escapar da habilidade de Pegasus de ler mentes: Yugi alterna entre suas duas almas! Yugi consegue destruir o Mundo Toon de Pegasus, mas o duelo s comeou. O prximo nvel do mortal Jogo da Sombra est prestes a comear!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi esmorece de cansao sob o poder do devastador Jogo da Sombra. Seus amigos gritam incentivos desesperados, mas suas vozes no conseguem penetrar a esfera de escurido. A chance de vitria de Yugi est esvaecendo, e sua vida tambm.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 5

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill, (1980, Thriller)
programme.desc: A psycho-killer stalks two New York City women--one a frustrated housewife, the other a street-smart hooker who teams up with the first woman's son to trap the murderer. The film reaches a shocking climax when the slayer's real identity is revealed.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Urban Cowboy, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A West Texas farm boy goes to the big city where he rides a mechanical bull, meets his future wife, and encounters the antagonism of an ex-con

programme.title: Grease 2, (1982, Musical)
programme.desc: Return to rockin Rydell High for a whole new term! Its 1961, two years after the original "Grease" gang graduated, and theres a new crop of seniors and new members of the coolest cliques on campus.

programme.title: Valley Girl, (1983, Romance)
programme.desc: When Valley Girl Julie (Deborah Foreman) dumps her preppy boyfriend, she unexpectedly finds love with rocker Randy (Nicolas Cage)...much to the dismay of her valley girlfriends who find Julie's punk hunk to be "grody to the max!" Fer Shure.

programme.title: Three Amigos!, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short are three wild and crazy caballeros in this comedy adventure thats a fiesta of fun. Co-starring Phil Hartman and Jon Lovitz, the 'Three Amigos!' blaze a side-splitting trail across the comedy frontier!

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: The Honeymooners, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bus driver Ralph Kramden and sanitation engineer Ed Norton are best friends who dream of making it big. Their most recent get-rich-quick plan finds the boys out to make their fortune by hiring a dog trainer to race their pet greyhound.

programme.title: Gambit, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Harry Deane (Colin Firth) is a man with a plan. Art Curator for media tycoon, Lord Lionel Shabandar (Alan Rickman), Harry devises an elaborate plot to con his abusive boss into purchasing a fake Monet painting.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: Sara is a small-town girl who dreams to become a world-class ballerina. But when her mother suddenly dies, she must abandon her plans and join her estranged father on Chicago's South Side.

programme.title: The Prince and Me, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: A fairy tale love-story about a pre-med student who falls in love with a Danish Prince who refused to follow the traditions of his parents and has come to the US to rebel.

programme.title: Shall We Dance?, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: John Clark is a meek workaholic who feels trapped in a dull, mind-numbing existence. One night, his whole life changes after the sight of a beautiful dance instructor inspire him to break out of his mold and sign up for some fancy footwork.

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lee hesitates when Tsunade asks him whether he will quit pursuing the path of a ninja or choose to undergo a risky surgery with only a fifty percent chance of success.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are to protect the runners in a race being held during the Todoroki Shrine's ceremonial ritual held every four years.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The chief retainers think that Idate has made a farce of their great traditional festival. Jirocho believes that Idate has fled with some plan in mind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is promoted to chunin, and he and his squadmates celebrate at a BBQ restaurant. In the hospital, Lee decides to undergo a dangerous surgery to repair his body so that he can remain a ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Sasuke release their ultimate weapons against each other, and just in time, Kakashi arrives to stop the fight.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo and Tayuya, suddenly appear before Sasuke. Sakura is concerned about the Curse Mark placed on Sasuke by Orochimaru
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sakuras pleas fall on deaf ears, and Sasuke leaves Hidden Leaf Village. When Tsunade learns of this, she summons Shikamaru to lead his first mission as a chunin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Sound Ninja Four race toward Orochimarus lair with Sasuke in hand. Theyre discovered and challenged by the jonin Genma and Raido
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are trapped in Jirobos Earth Dome Prison. They try to pound their way out, but the walls regenerate each time.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After they are freed from the Earth Dome Prison, Shikamaru and the others take off after the remaining Sound while Choji stays behind.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After Choji takes the yellow pill it looks as if he may win the battle, until Jirobo transforms into Second State, giving him immense power.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Neji takes on Kidomaru while the others continue their pursuit of Sasuke and the remaining Sound ninja.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kidomaru changes tactics and creates a bow and arrow to attack Nejis blind spot.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Shikamaru, Kiba and Akamaru are in hot pursuit of Sasuke and the Sound ninja. Naruto and Kiba are upset that they have been unable to catch up and decide to try a surprise attack at night.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru sets explosives in the trees to trap Sakon. But an incensed Sakon turns the tables, and the explosives end up sending Kiba, Akamaru and Sakon off a cliff.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru is determined to stop Tayuya, but she uses her Summoning Jutsu to call forth three giants. Meanwhile, on the plains, the battle between Kimimaro and Naruto is about to begin.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Ukon, who is able to infiltrate the bodies of others, enters Kibas body and tries to merge with his cells.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An injured Kiba and Akamaru barely escape from Sakon and Ukon. Naruto is locked in battle with Kimimaro
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru succeeds in trapping Tayuya with his Shadow Possession Jutsu. But Tayuya moves to her Second State and fights back with enormous strength.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With Rock Lee there to take on Kimimaro, Naruto is free to chase after Sasuke, who has awakened.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Shikamaru, Kiba and Lee are at the limits of their strength when Gaara, Temari and Kankuro appear to assist their Leaf allies.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro realizes that close combat is impossible against Gaaras wall of sand, so he moves further away for a long-distance attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kimimaro succeeds in shattering Gaaras protective sand shield and attacks Gaara. Naruto finally catches up to Sasuke
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: With the Curse Mark covering half his body, Sasuke is no longer the Sasuke of old. Naruto charges at this new Sasuke who has turned his back on his closest comrades.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto tries desperately to change Sasukes mind, but Sasuke is determined to go to Orochimaru. He tells Naruto that in order to surpass his brother, Itachi, power and hatred are necessary.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin, (2006, Thriller)

programme.title: Titanic, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: Cube, (1997, Thriller)

programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Arrival, (1996, Science fiction)

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: Friday Foster, (1975, Blaxploitation)
programme.desc: No sooner has photojournalist Friday Foster (Pam Grier) been warned that her personal involvement in stories will not end happily, than she witnesses the attempted assassination of a prominent African-American figure. Now Friday is a target!

programme.desc: Pam Grier stars as Coffy, a one-woman vigilante force, out to even the score with those who have hooked her sister on drugs. Coffy uses her sex appeal and an assortment of weapons to rid the streets of society's scum in this cult classic.

programme.title: Ned Kelly, (1970, Western)

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Its in the Cards, Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!

programme.desc: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief. Can Yuma put a stop to this thiefs thieving ways, or will Yumas newest friend trash his plan to stop him?

programme.desc: Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yumas Golden Key by challenging him to a duel. Can Shark sink his teeth into Kites life points and save Yumas prized possession, or will Kites cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1
programme.desc: With his Golden Key in Kites possession, Yuma must hunt down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see Astral again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2
programme.desc: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, while Astral looks for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Frozen in Time
programme.desc: When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Let the Duels Begin
programme.desc: With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world that is, until he realizes he never entered. Can Yuma figure out a way to join the Carnival, or will Yumas efforts fall short?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Team Performance
programme.desc: The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind: victory.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: Yuma rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Yuma broke Annas heart years ago, and now shes back for revenge. If Yuma loses, he has to be Annas boyfriend forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: No Tomato
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest test to date when he challenges the tomato loving Tombo to a duel. Can Yuma overcome his hate for tomatoes and be victorious, or will his taste buds only be serving up defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Life Is a Carnival, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Foolish Fans

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Bad Developments, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Double Jeopardy, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Double Jeopardy, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Pets Peeved
programme.desc: When Yuma's Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy calls on her feline friends to help hunt them down. After finding the hounds' hideout, Cathy is challenged by the pack leader to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Losing Hart
programme.desc: As Kite desperately searches for his brother, Vetrix puts his diabolical plan for revenge in motion.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Dubious Duo

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Dragon Awakens
programme.desc: Kite must learn to work with Yuma if he wants to take down Trey and Quattro and rescue Hart. Can Kite put his pride aside and accept Yumas help, or will Kites ego end up sacrificing Harts safety?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rock and a Hard Place

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Family Leave

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!

programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: After surviving a terrible storm to reach the entrance to the Red Line, Luffy slugs a mysterious sea monster and Sanji may finally get to meet a mermaid!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HALFWAY ACROSS THE GRAND LINE / ARRIVAL AT THE RED LINE!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats agree to help a mermaid rescue her friend, but the mission gets dangerous when a gang of flying fish dive bomb their boat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HE HATES THE STRAW HAT CREW / IRON MASKED DUVAL MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: The Straw Hats agree to join Camie's rescue mission, but her captured friend turns out to be a dangerous enemy from the past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FATED REUNION! SAVE THE CAPTIVE FISHMAN

programme.title: The Straw Hats wage a death-defying battle with a group of flying fish, and Luffy is shocked by the familiar face of their latest enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TRAGEDY! THE TRUTH HIDDEN UNDER DUVAL'S MASK

programme.title: Sanji squares off against his lookalike, Camie shows off just how fast a mermaid can swim, and Luffy defeats a giant bull without even landing a blow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXPLOSION! SUNNY'S SUPER-SECRET WEAPON, GAON CANNON

programme.title: After their showdown with Duval, Luffy and the Straw Hats enjoy a hearty meal before proceeding to the site of their next adventure an island bursting with bubbles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DISEMBARKING WITH SIGHTS SET ON FISH-MAN ISLAND / THE SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stop at an island overflowing with bubbles to get their ship modified for underwater travel, but it's not long before they stumble upon an outrageous explosion and attract unwanted attention.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TYRANNY! THE RULERS OF SABAODY, THE CELESTIAL DRAGONS

programme.title: Shakky explains why Sabaody Archipelago seems to be crawling with bounty hunters eleven of the Grand Line's most wanted pirates are currently ashore and two of them are in Luffy's crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A mysterious stranger keeps Zoro from tangling with a powerful Celestial Dragon, and Chopper goes bonkers when Camie disappears from the amusement park.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE TARGET IS CAMIE!! THE LOOMING CLUTCHES OF A PROFESSIONAL KIDNAPPER

programme.title: Camie was abducted by a dastardly gang of kidnappers, and her next stop is the auction house unless the Straw Hats can rescue her. To make it in time, they'll have to hitch a ride on some flying fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: RESCUE CAMIE / THE ARCHIPELAGO'S LINGERING DARK HISTORY

programme.title: With a little help from their fishy mates, the Straw Hats make it to the auction house in time to save Camie, but explosive elements prevent them from taking her back by force. Luckily, Nami's concocted a very generous plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TIME LIMIT / THE HUMAN AUCTION BEGINS

programme.title: Nami's plan to save Camie goes belly up when a snot-nosed Celestial Dragon outbids the Straw Hats. Luffy and Zoro make an explosive arrival at the auction house and promptly open up a deadly can of worms.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIST EXPLODES! DESTROY THE AUCTION

programme.title: Luffy turns a mermaid auction into a pirate-style brawl when he knocks the snot out of a Celestial Dragon. With a fleet of marines out to get them, the Straw Hats will have to fight their way off the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAJOR PANIC! DESPERATE STRUGGLE AT THE AUCTION HOUSE

programme.title: They saved Camie from the auction block, but now the Straw Hats are surrounded by a fleet of marines. Lucky for Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kidd and Trafalgar Law are ready to join the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ADMIRAL KIZARU TAKES ACTION! SABAODY ARCHIPELAGO THROWN INTO CHAOS

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Outlander, (2009, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man from another world crash lands on Earth during the age of the Vikings.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: Indian Territory, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Following the Civil War, Cavalry Sergeant Gene Autry is sent to break up a series of Indian raids upon settlers, led by a renegade Austrian, who wishes to use the Indians to build an empire.

programme.title: Mule Train, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: When natural cement is discovered by two prospectors, one is murdered during a claim jump attempt. Marshal Gene Autry befriends the lone prospector and tries to help him promote his cement discovery.

programme.title: The Blazing Sun, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and pal Mike hunt bank robbers Al Bartlett and Trot Lucas. To throw off his pursuers, Bartlett kills his own twin brother and Lucas hoping that Gene and the Sheriff will believe him dead.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass, (1975, Drama)
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Valdez Is Coming, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: In this rousing Western, when a greedy rancher causes the death of an innocent man, former sheriff Bob Valdez (Burt Lancaster) orders him to provide financial support for the widow. But when he refuses, Valdez vows to exact justice at any cost!

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Miss Potter, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Biography of children's author Beatrix Potter, including how she overcame a domineering mother, and the chauvinism of Victorian England, to become a best-selling author.

programme.title: Bottle Shock, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: Finding Neverland, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Both fantasy and everyday reality meld in this unforgettable acclaimed drama exploring the origins of one of the greatest fables of all timePETER PAN. Nominated for seven Academy Awards, including Best Picture.

programme.title: Capote, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1959, Truman Capote learns about the horrific and senseless murder of a family of four in Kansas. As he digs deeper into the story, he is inspired to expand the project into what would be his greatest work, In Cold Blood.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: World Trade Center, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Michael Pea star as two New York City Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.desc: A widowed New York socialite and her aimless son move to Paris after she spends the last of her husbands inheritance. Starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Lucas Hedges, Tracy Letts.

programme.title: Neighbors
programme.desc: A young couple suffering from arrested development are forced to live next to a fraternity house after the birth of their newborn baby. Starring Seth Rogen, Zac Efron, Rose Byrne.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A rising journalist (Katherine Heigl) and an irresponsible slacker (Seth Rogen) ponder their future after a boozy one-night stand results in a pregnancy. Starring Seth Rogen, Katherine Heigl, Paul Rudd.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Bella Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) uses his superhuman powers to battle his archenemy, the Green Goblin (Willem Dafoe). Starring Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe, Kirsten Dunst.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Tormented Peter Parker battles a sinister scientist who uses mechanical tentacles for destructive purposes. Starring Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Peter Parker undergoes an ominous transformation when his Spider-Man suit turns black and brings out the dark, vengeful side of his personality. Starring Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, James Franco.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Jor-El (Marlon Brando) of Krypton sends his baby to Earth, where he grows up as Clark Kent (Christopher Reeve) and works at the Daily Planet. Starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Marlon Brando.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel (Christopher Reeve) gets serious with Lois Lane (Margot Kidder) and fights three Krypton outcasts in league with Lex Luthor (Gene Hackman). Starring Christopher Reeve, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Ersatz kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman (Christopher Reeve) in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel. Starring Christopher Reeve, Richard Pryor, Robert Vaughn.

programme.title: Salvable
programme.desc: A battered boxer finds his dreams and relationships on the ropes when he falls back in with a dangerous crowd. Starring Toby Kebbell, Shia LaBeouf, James Cosmo.

programme.title: Alarum
programme.desc: Living off the grid while vacationing at a winter resort, married spies Joe and Lara come under fire from members of the old guard who suspect theyve joined an elite team of rogue spies. Starring Scott Eastwood, Sylvester Stallone, Willa Fitzgerald.

programme.title: When Night Is Falling
programme.desc: A bisexual mythology professor (Pascale Bussires) has an affair with a circus performer (Rachael Crawford) she met at a laundromat. Starring Pascale Bussires, Rachael Crawford, Henry Czerny.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Fortified in a massive, armored truck, loner Mad Max joins Imperator Furiosa and her band of rebels as they try to outrun a warlord and his henchmen in a deadly high-speed chase through the wasteland. Starring Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult.

programme.title: America, America
programme.desc: A Greek youth pursues his dream of immigrating to America in the late 1890s. Written and directed by Elia Kazan. Starring Stathis Giallelis, Frank Wolff, Elena Karam.

programme.title: Song of My City
programme.desc: A city symphony of 1970s New York as it exists in the movies that mythologized it.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
programme.desc: Four men hijack a crowded subway train and threaten to murder one hostage for every minute the ransom demand is late. Starring Walter Matthau, Robert Shaw, Martin Balsam.

programme.title: Song of My City
programme.desc: A city symphony of 1970s New York as it exists in the movies that mythologized it.

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: Small-time hoods (Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel) hang out in a bar and get into big trouble in New Yorks Little Italy. Starring Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, Richard Romanus.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A Harlem mob boss (Moses Gunn) hires a private eye (Richard Roundtree) to find his kidnapped daughter. Starring Richard Roundtree, Moses Gunn, Christopher St. John.

programme.title: The American Friend
programme.desc: A German picture framer (Bruno Ganz) meets a shady American loner (Dennis Hopper) who gets him a job as a hit man. Starring Dennis Hopper, Bruno Ganz, Lisa Kreuzer.

programme.title: Song of My City
programme.desc: A city symphony of 1970s New York as it exists in the movies that mythologized it.

programme.title: The Penguin Pool Murder
programme.desc: New York schoolmarm Hildegarde Withers (Edna May Oliver) assists a detective (James Gleason) with an aquarium corpse. Starring Edna May Oliver, James Gleason, Mae Clarke.

programme.title: Murder on the Blackboard
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Hildegarde Withers uses a musical notation on a blackboard to solve the murder of a young colleague. Starring Edna May Oliver, James Gleason, Bruce Cabot.

programme.title: Murder on a Honeymoon
programme.desc: Schoolmarm Hildegarde Withers (Edna May Oliver) solves Catalina murders without her detective boyfriend (James Gleason). Starring Edna May Oliver, James Gleason, Lola Lane.

programme.title: Murder on a Bridle Path
programme.desc: New York schoolmarm Hildegarde Withers (Helen Broderick) and her detective boyfriend (James Gleason) think the butler did it. Starring Helen Broderick, James Gleason, Louise Latimer.

programme.title: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: New York schoolmarm Hildegarde Withers (ZaSu Pitts) and her detective boyfriend (James Gleason) find art behind murder. Starring James Gleason, Zasu Pitts, Owen Davis Jr..

programme.title: Forty Naughty Girls
programme.desc: New York schoolmarm Hildegarde Withers (ZaSu Pitts) solves backstage murders for her detective boyfriend (James Gleason). Starring James Gleason, Zasu Pitts, Marjorie Lord.

programme.title: Murder, She Said
programme.desc: Agatha Christies sleuth Miss Marple (Margaret Rutherford) gets a job at an estate where she thinks theres a corpse. Starring Margaret Rutherford, Arthur Kennedy, Muriel Pavlow.

programme.title: Murder at the Gallop
programme.desc: Agatha Christies sleuth Miss Marple (Margaret Rutherford) must mix with the horsy set to prove murder. Starring Margaret Rutherford, Robert Morley, Flora Robson.

programme.title: Murder Most Foul
programme.desc: Agatha Christies tweedy sleuth Miss Marple (Margaret Rutherford) is a juror with a hunch about a murder trial. Starring Margaret Rutherford, Ron Moody, Bud Tingwell.

programme.title: Murder Ahoy!
programme.desc: Poisoned snuff leads Agatha Christies sleuth Miss Marple (Margaret Rutherford) to a cadet-training ship and a killer. Starring Margaret Rutherford, Lionel Jeffries, Bud Tingwell.

programme.title: The Devil and Miss Jones
programme.desc: The worlds richest man (Charles Coburn) poses as a worker in one of his stores, where a salesgirl (Jean Arthur) opens his eyes. Starring Jean Arthur, Robert Cummings, Charles Coburn.

programme.title: The More the Merrier
programme.desc: A working girl (Jean Arthur) shares a Washington, D.C., apartment with two men (Joel McCrea, Charles Coburn). Starring Jean Arthur, Joel McCrea, Charles Coburn.

programme.title: A Foreign Affair
programme.desc: An Iowa congresswoman (Jean Arthur) rivals a bistro singer (Marlene Dietrich) for an Army captain (John Lund) in postwar Berlin. Starring Jean Arthur, Marlene Dietrich, John Lund.

programme.title: The Impatient Years
programme.desc: A GI (Lee Bowman) comes home to the wife (Jean Arthur) he hastily married before he left; theyre soon ready for a divorce. Starring Jean Arthur, Lee Bowman, Charles Coburn.

programme.title: Third Finger, Left Hand
programme.desc: An artist (Melvyn Douglas) moves in with a magazine editor (Myrna Loy) whose job depends on the pretense of a husband. Starring Myrna Loy, Melvyn Douglas, Raymond Walburn.

programme.title: Lady of the Tropics
programme.desc: An American playboy (Robert Taylor) falls in love with a Saigon beauty (Hedy Lamarr) who needs a passport. Starring Robert Taylor, Hedy Lamarr, Joseph Schildkraut.

programme.title: Waterloo Bridge
programme.desc: A ballet dancer (Vivien Leigh) and a British officer (Robert Taylor) cross stars on the eve of World War I. Starring Vivien Leigh, Robert Taylor, Lucile Watson.

programme.title: High Wall
programme.desc: A mental-hospital psychiatrist (Audrey Totter) helps a dazed ex-bomber pilot (Robert Taylor) found next to his strangled wife. Starring Robert Taylor, Audrey Totter, Herbert Marshall.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Air Force Col. Paul Tibbets (Robert Taylor) cannot tell his wife (Eleanor Parker) he is training to drop the atomic bomb on Hiroshima. Starring Robert Taylor, Eleanor Parker, James Whitmore.

programme.title: Valley of the Kings
programme.desc: An archaeologist (Robert Taylor) and a married woman (Eleanor Parker) dig for a pharaohs treasure-filled tomb in 1900 Egypt. Starring Robert Taylor, Eleanor Parker, Kurt Kasznar.

programme.title: Ivanhoe
programme.desc: Back from a Crusade, the knight hero (Robert Taylor) of Sir Walter Scotts novel fights for courtly love and Saxon honor. Starring Robert Taylor, Elizabeth Taylor, Joan Fontaine.

programme.title: Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Sir Gawain meets the Green Knight, Sir Percival seeks the Holy Grail, and King Arthurs (Mel Ferrer) Guinevere (Ava Gardner) loves Sir Lancelot (Robert Taylor). Starring Robert Taylor, Ava Gardner, Mel Ferrer.

programme.title: A Letter to Three Wives
programme.desc: A flirt tells three women (Jeanne Crain, Linda Darnell, Ann Sothern) she will be leaving town with one of their husbands. Starring Jeanne Crain, Linda Darnell, Ann Sothern.

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: A cynical nightclub owner in Casablanca protects an old flame and her husband from Nazis, while also trying to navigate his complicated past. Starring Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, Paul Henreid.

programme.title: Brief Encounter
programme.desc: A married British woman (Celia Johnson) and a doctor (Trevor Howard) meet first at a train station, then fall in love but decide to part. Starring Celia Johnson, Trevor Howard, Stanley Holloway.

programme.title: The Barkleys of Broadway
programme.desc: Half of a husband-and-wife dance team (Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers) wants to be an actress, so they split up. Starring Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Oscar Levant.

programme.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
programme.desc: Sudden money ruins a struggling writer (Van Johnson) and his wife (Elizabeth Taylor) in post-World War II Paris. Starring Elizabeth Taylor, Van Johnson, Walter Pidgeon.

programme.title: Alice in Movieland
programme.desc: Alice wins a free trip to Hollywood and dreams about her arrival. Starring Joan Leslie, Nana Bryant, Clara Blandick.

programme.title: Some Came Running
programme.desc: An ex-GI writer (Frank Sinatra) hangs out with a gambler (Dean Martin) and a floozy (Shirley MacLaine) in his hometown. Starring Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Tarzans Magic Fountain
programme.desc: The ape man (Lex Barker) finds an aviator (Evelyn Ankers) who crashed 20 years earlier near a Fountain of Youth. Starring Lex Barker, Brenda Joyce, Evelyn Ankers.

programme.title: King for a Day
programme.desc: A talented tap dancer uses his craps skills to win ownership of a musical show to make himself the star. Starring Bill Robinson, Ernest Whitman, Dusty Fletcher.

programme.title: Dont Look Back
programme.desc: Filmmaker D.A. Pennebaker chronicles Bob Dylans 1965 British concert tour, with Joan Baez and Donovan.

programme.title: The Big Combo
programme.desc: A police detective (Cornel Wilde) in love with the girlfriend of a vicious gangster (Richard Conte) pursues him relentlessly. Starring Cornel Wilde, Richard Conte, Brian Donlevy.

programme.title: Reunion in France
programme.desc: A French manufacturers (Philip Dorn) playgirl fiancee (Joan Crawford) hides a downed Allied pilot (John Wayne) from the Gestapo. Starring Joan Crawford, John Wayne, Philip Dorn.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Supercomputer HAL 9000 guides astronauts (Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester) on a trip to find the origins of humans. Starring Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester.

programme.title: Twice in a Lifetime
programme.desc: An unhappily married steelworker (Gene Hackman) turns 50 and sees a chance for a whole new life with a barmaid (Ann-Margret). Starring Gene Hackman, Ellen Burstyn, Ann-Margret.

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
programme.desc: A Hollywood child-star has-been (Bette Davis) torments her famous sister (Joan Crawford), now in a wheelchair. Starring Bette Davis, Joan Crawford, Victor Buono.

programme.title: Shield for Murder
programme.desc: A police detective (Edmond OBrien) kills a bookie, robs him and hides the loot at his suburban dream house. Starring Edmond OBrien, John Agar, Marla English.

programme.title: The Gumball Rally
programme.desc: A businessman (Michael Sarrazin), his rival (Tim McIntire) and other speed lovers enter an outlaw coast-to-coast car race. Starring Michael Sarrazin, Tim McIntire, Raul Julia.

programme.desc: Steve (Steve Harvey) declines running for the Teacher of the Year award so Cedric (Cedric The Entertainer) can win.

programme.desc: Regina teaches a television producer how to dance; a famous photographer wants to take pictures of Lovita.

programme.desc: Regina (Wendy Raquel Robinson) goes overboard in her quest to win a choir competition. With Steve Harvey.

programme.title: Million to One

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Letting Go
programme.desc: Kady treats the school hamster that Michael accidentally killed as though it is still alive; Michael catches Claire in a lie.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Learning to Earn It
programme.desc: Michael is thrilled when the children start their own businesses after squandering their allowances in one day.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Road Trip

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Table for Too Many

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Table for Too Many
programme.desc: The war between the Tylers and Kyles continue in the restaurant, with everyone nearly going at it with each other.

programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, shell have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: Tom Clancys Without Remorse (2021)
programme.desc: Seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife, an elite Navy SEAL uncovers a covert plot that threatens to engulf the United States and Russia in an all-out war.

programme.title: Congo (1995)
programme.desc: Killer gorillas menace an ex-CIA agent (Laura Linney), a primatologist (Dylan Walsh) and others on a mission in Africa.

programme.title: Species (1995)
programme.desc: A scientist (Ben Kingsley) leads the hunt for a genetically engineered creature who morphs into a human blonde and tries to reproduce in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Species II (1998)
programme.desc: A half-alien female (Natasha Henstridge) escapes from a government compound to search for the half-alien male who has been raping and fatally impregnating women.

programme.title: Species III (2004)
programme.desc: An alien hybrid beauty (Sunny Mabrey) follows her overwhelming, but deadly, urge to mate while commandos hunt her down.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening (2007)
programme.desc: With help from her uncle, a woman (Helena Mattsson) who is a half-human, half-alien clone searches for the scientist who created her.

programme.title: Theres Something Wrong With the Children (2023)
programme.sub-title: Theres Something Wrong With the Children (2023)
programme.desc: Margaret and Ben take a weekend trip with two longtime friends and their two young children. Ben soon suspects something sinister is afoot when the kids start behaving strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Theres no topic off the table for Louis Katz as he spins his stories as a globe-trotting comedian into even more comedy gold.

programme.title: The Importance of Being Earnest (2002)
programme.desc: Complications arise after two bachelors (Rupert Everett, Colin Firth) make use of the same pseudonym in 19th-century England.

programme.title: The Alamo (1960)
programme.desc: Davy Crockett (John Wayne), Jim Bowie (Richard Widmark) and William Travis (Laurence Harvey) die defending the Texas fort against Mexican soldiers in 1836.

programme.title: Snack Shack (2024)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pools rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Run the Tide (2016)
programme.desc: When his drug-addicted mother leaves prison, a man (Taylor Lautner) kidnaps his younger brother (Nico Christou) and flees to the California coast for a better life.

programme.title: Heavens Gate (1980)
programme.desc: A well-educated marshal defends immigrant settlers against cattle barons in the 1890s Johnson County, Wyoming.

programme.title: The Fire Inside (2024)
programme.desc: The story of Claressa "T-Rex" Shields, a boxer from Flint, Mich., who trained to become the first woman in her countrys history to win an Olympic gold medal in the sport.

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000)
programme.desc: A golf caddy (Will Smith) shows a disillusioned young war veteran (Matt Damon) how to master challenges and find meaning in life.

programme.title: The Natural (1984)
programme.desc: The almost mythical ability of a middle-aged baseball player rockets a major-league team toward the 1939 pennant.

programme.title: Roofman (2025)
programme.desc: Escaped convict Jeffrey Manchester hides out in a Toys "R" Us, surviving undetected for months while planning his next move. However, his double life starts to unravel when he falls for a divorced mom, setting off a compelling game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Seabiscuit (2003)
programme.desc: A jockey (Tobey Maguire), an automobile magnate (Jeff Bridges) and a trainer (Chris Cooper) lead a racehorse to glory during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Unseen (2023)
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman whos running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emilys only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: Tom Clancys Without Remorse (2021)
programme.desc: Seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife, an elite Navy SEAL uncovers a covert plot that threatens to engulf the United States and Russia in an all-out war.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2 (2015)
programme.desc: The magical hot tub sends Lou (Rob Corddry), Nick (Craig Robinson) and Jacob (Clark Duke) to the year 2025 to prevent an unknown assailant from shooting Lou.

programme.title: All Dogs Go to Heaven (1989)
programme.desc: A junkyard dog returns to Earth from heaven thanks to the powers of a magical, rewindable watch, though his objective changes as he watches events unfold in his former stomping grounds.

programme.title: All Dogs Go to Heaven 2 (1996)
programme.desc: Charlie Barkin is finding life in dog heaven a little dull, and he longs to go back to Earth. When Charlies old nemesis, Carface, steals the horn used by the archangel Gabriel, Charlie and Itchy quickly volunteer to retrieve it.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express (1974)
programme.desc: Belgian sleuth Hercule Poirot investigates an American industrialists murder aboard the world-famous luxury train.

programme.title: Max 2: White House Hero (2017)
programme.desc: Max, a military service dog, is assigned to serve on the U.S. presidents Secret Service detail.

programme.title: The Dogs of War (1980)
programme.desc: Jamie, a mercenary, is hired by a large corporation to help liberate Zangaro, a small African nation, from an iron-fisted despot. Once there, Jamie learns more about the plight of the countrys people and joins the Zangaro peoples fight.

programme.title: The Dead Zone (1983)
programme.desc: A man (Christopher Walken) comes out of a coma able to see the probable futures of anyone he touches.

programme.title: Van Helsing (2004)
programme.desc: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankensteins research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead (1999)
programme.desc: After too many years on the job, an EMS paramedic (Nicolas Cage) begins an emotional descent during 56-hour tour.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: The Mexican (2001)
programme.desc: A bungling gangster (Brad Pitt) must reform to please his girlfriend (Julia Roberts) but still has one last job to fulfill.

programme.title: Love, Sex, and Hollywood
programme.desc: Emilys catering gig leads to a job at a movie star Matthews talent agency, where she unexpectedly lands a TV role and skyrockets to fame. However, as romance blooms, disaster strikes when nude photos surface, threatening her career and his..

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
programme.desc: Branded a traitor, an elite intelligence agent (Tom Cruise) investigates a failed Prague mission to retrieve a computer disk.

programme.title: Grudge Match (2013)
programme.desc: A boxing promoter (Kevin Hart) offers two rival boxers (Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone) the chance to come out of retirement for one final bout.

programme.title: Dreamland (2019)
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Silence (2016)
programme.desc: Two 17th-century Portuguese missionaries (Andrew Garfield, Adam Driver) face the ultimate test of faith when they travel to Japan to find their missing mentor (Liam Neeson).

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)

programme.title: The Cut (2024)
programme.desc: Given one last shot at glory, a former boxing champion has just six days to make weight for a title fight. His obsession soon leaves him at the mercy of a notorious trainer who takes every last ounce from his mind, body and soul.

programme.title: I See You (2019)
programme.desc: Strange occurrences plague a small-town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a boy.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs (2024)
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss, a former homicide detective tries to solve a brutal murder that he cant recall. As he pieces together evidence from a decade-old investigation, he soon uncovers a sinister web of buried secrets tied to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.
